landing.title: Massage Treatments
landing.description: Professional massage treatments in Bedford. Thai massage, Deep Tissue, Pregnancy, Lymphatic Drainage, Aromatherapy & Hot Stone by qualified therapist Amy.

tiles.title: Professional Theraputic Massage Treatments
tiles.text: Choose from our range of expertly delivered treatments designed to relax, rejuvenate, and restore your body and mind. Each service is tailored to your individual needs.

service1.name: Aromatherapy Massage
service1.tagline: A therapeutic treatment combining gentle massage with carefully selected essential oils. The aromatic properties work with skilled touch to promote deep relaxation, reduce stress, and enhance overall wellbeing.

service2.name: Traditional Thai Massage
service2.tagline: An ancient healing practice from Thailand combining acupressure, stretching, and yoga-like movements. Relieves muscle tension and promotes energy flow using hands, elbows, knees, and feet.

service3.name: Back, Neck & Shoulder Massage
service3.tagline: A targeted treatment focusing on areas most affected by daily stress and poor posture. Addresses muscle tension and stiffness in the upper body using various massage techniques.

service4.name: Hot Stone Massage
service4.tagline: A luxurious treatment using smooth, heated volcanic stones placed on key body points. The warmth penetrates deeply into muscles, promoting relaxation and improving circulation.

service5.name: Deep Tissue Massage
service5.tagline: An intensive therapeutic technique targeting deeper muscle layers and connective tissue. Uses slower strokes and focused pressure to release chronic tension and address persistent pain.

service6.name: Manual Lymphatic Drainage
service6.tagline: A specialised gentle massage stimulating the lymphatic system to reduce swelling and promote detoxification. Light, rhythmic strokes encourage natural drainage, supporting immune function and toxin elimination.

service7.name: Pregnancy Massage
service7.tagline: A nurturing treatment adapted for expectant mothers, focusing on safety and comfort during pregnancy. Alleviates common discomforts such as back pain and swelling whilst promoting relaxation.
